title: Bleeding Me
lyrics:
Intro: Em7 D Em7 D Em7 D Em7 Em7 G D9 2x

Verse 1:
Em5           D5 Em5                 D5
 I'm diggin' my way    I'm diggin' my way to something
Em5              D5     Em5   G D9
 I'm diggin' my way to somethin' better
Em5           D5 Em5                  D5
 I'm pushin' my stay   I'm pushin' my stay to something
Em5              D5     Em5   D5
 I'm pushin' my stay to something better

Bridge : Em5 D5 D5 Em5 Em5 D5 D5 Em5

Verse 2:
Em5            D5 Em5                  D5
 I'm sowing the seeds   I'm sowing the seeds I've taken
Em5              D5     Em5   G D9
 I'm sowing the seeds I take for granted
Em5             D5 Em5                D5
 This thorn in my side   This thorn in my side is from the tree
Em5                D5           Em5   D5
 This thorn in my side is from the tree I've planted

Chorus :
Em           D               Am
 Caught under the wheels roll I take the leech I'm bleeding me
Em         D                Am
 Can't stop to save my soul I take the leash that's leading me
Em        D       Am
 I'm bleeding me Who ooh  I can't take it
Em           D                 Am
 Caught under the wheel's roll The bleeding of me

Bridge 2:
D|-9--------9--------9---------------10--9--|
A|-7--------7--------7--------7--10---------|
E|-0--0--0--0--0--0--0--0--0----------------|

I am the beast that feeds the beast
I am the blood, I am release
Come make me pure Bleed me a cure
I'm caught I'm caught I'm caught under

Chorus :
Em           D               Am
 Caught under the wheels roll I take the leech I'm bleeding me
Em         D                Am
 Can't stop to save my soul I take the leash that's leading me
Em        D       Am
 I'm bleeding me Who ooh  I can't take it
Em           D                 Am
 Caught under the wheel's roll The bleeding of me

Verse 1
Chorus
